Uma verdadeira PORCARIA! Completamente desbalanceado, a ÚNICA arma que vc tem contra o assassino é a FÉ, pq o RESTO n serve pra NADA!
Agora depois da ultima atualização o o assassino dá golpe em ÁREA, isso mesmo, GOLPE EM ÁREA, então mesmo se vc desviar e estiver na margem do ataque, pega em vc.
tenho TOTAL certeza de que quem criou esse jogo é um satanista ou um serial killer oficial, pois n é possível que TODOS os assassinos tenham todas as vantagens e os sobreviventes NENHUMA.
Além do mais, o jogo ta cheio de HACK.
Peguei de graça na EPIC e deu uma vontade de pedir o reembolso na steam mas ja era tarde.
F pra mim e pra quem mais comprou

2년정도 한거같은데 요즘 돌아가는 꼴 보면 추천못함.

핵유저가 최근에 어마어마하게 증가했고, 비매너 티배깅은 원래 심했고..

서버도 한국서버 만들어놓고 한국인보다 '그나라'사람이 많이보인다.

핵유저 만나고 프로필보면 vac밴기록있고 플탐도 100시간 이하인 '그 나라'사람인데 (20~30시간인데 퍽도 빵빵함,혹은 아예노퍽함)

심지어 끝나고 채팅창에 핵홍보 하더라 (물론 한국핵도 자주만남, 살인마랑 둘이 핵배틀하는거 보면 욕나오면서 웃기다)

신고해도 제대로 처리해주는지 모르겠음

인게임 핵신고는 없는거랑 똑같은 수준이고, 그나마 BEHAVIOUR사이트에서 핵신고하면 처리는 해준다고 하는데

실제로 거기 해봐도 3일뒤에 자동메일 와서 문의밀려서 처리중이라고 하나오고 끝임. 1달동안 그 외 소식X

신고했던 핵쟁이는 그동안 3번 더 만남. 게임 오래했으면 더만났을 것 같다.

이와중에 스팀 어워드에 자기들 찍어달라 했다가 국내외 안가리고 욕은 욕대로 겁나먹는 수준에

최근 DLC에서 밸런스 초토화내고 부정적 잔뜩받는거 보면 다른게임 찾는게 이롭다고 말해주고 싶다.
Polecam
Very fun game!

I probably have close to 1000 hours in DBD across different consoles.

The game is frustrating as hell, it feels futile, it's staying hidden at all costs and if you are seen it's only a matter of time before you're downed.

After some time the game changes entirely from one of intensity and terror, to utter shenanigans and hilarity. Instead of running from killers I'm following them and toying with them, and experimenting with different perk builds to have more creative options in doing so. 

I get more laughs and tickled moments from DbD than any other game. It took some time but DbD developed into one of the best gaming experiences I've had.
Não recomendo jogar solo, muito melhor em duo ou mais. Se vc gosta de jogar de killer aí vc que se resolva. MMR meio desbalanceado, mas não impossível.
Really fun game, when you don't get a campy killer

Das Spiel macht echt Spaß und vor allem nach einiger Zeit wenn man das System gut verstanden hat geht es echt. Vor allem mit Freunden zusammen Survivour und dabei in einem Call oder Custom Games machen echt Laune.
Jaja trotzdem eine Hassliebe. Teils Bugs, Salty Gegner oder Verbündete und natürlich entweder "nutzlose" Teammates oder "asoziale" Gegner muss man aushalten. Auch das *hust* tolle Matchmaking das Teils alle Arten von Spielern zusammensteckt und das nötige Grinden um Charaktere zu leveln kann teils nerven, aber ich finde vorallem mit den richtigen Leuten zusammen kann man gut darüber hinwegsehen oder sich zusammen aufregen. Auch die Preise sind jetzt nicht so schlimm. ca 5 Euro für einen Charakter oder 9.000 erspielbare Währung ist ok und möglich. 

Alles in allem ein gutes Spiel mit einigen Ecken und Kanten, welches es aber meiner Meinung nach trotzdem wert ist.

bestes game
amazing

fun for a bit and then turns into the most frustrating thing you'll ever play. Community is unbelievably toxic, and while i don't like people treating the game like it's comp CSGO and acting like winning and losing matters, solo queue team mates are notoriously bad. People refuse to play the objective and repair generators, and i can't completely blame them because when you end up doing 4 of the 5 generators in a match yourself, you probably die and get 8-9K points max and get killed first (which is nothing for those who dont know)

And then you have the most selfish players on the planet. The team you end up with is typically just purely selfish self sustaining perks or old stale meta perks. And let's not forget the team mates who run the killer straight into people trying to do gens, farming unhooks without a care for the situation they're putting people in, and leaving their team to die on hook. I've seen too many claudettes self caring in a corner for a minute while i bleed out or struggle on a hook to ever have faith in other people's intelligence or ability to help other people again.

killers are no better. it's not all but you will run into killers that tunnel you off hooks (when you're completely helpless) and camp you from the start of the match just to secure a single kill. 

devs are absolutely clueless about the game. they're currently working to shift the meta, but i've been here long enough to have little to no faith in them. They refuse to actually fix the game based on feedback and rely on faulty data to make decisions.Nurse is considered a "high skill" killer because she has a "low kill rate" which yeah, new nurse players don't know what they're doing, but spend an hour on nurse and you'll decimate teams, especially if you play the typical nurse strat of camp hook, tunnel, slug and leave people to bleed out for 5 minutes.

it's just a bad game. at it's core, there are good ideas, and i welcome the new games taking it's base formula and actually putting effort behind them. play those. avoid this. it is not worth the moderate amount of fun you will have early to suffer through a descent into complete and total madness over a game which could be easily fixed and made more enjoyable, and other players who will test the limits of your ability to deal with other people.
if u enjoy eating fruit loops, this is the game for you, you get to enjoy those loops around a rock

A game so toxic, that the devs themselves locked their own community post about how they hoped to be considered for the Labour Of Love Award 2021 after receiving nothing but abuse from their own player base.

Some may say that Dead by Daylight is nothing more than hide and seek with the most entitled and toxic player base imaginable. They'll say you have to have a thick skin to play.

Others say, "git gud" and "yo mamma" - which is always valid points in any review and/or discussion...

I had this years ago on PS and the toxic element definitely hasn't changed. So many legit stupid people play this.

The gameplay is a hilarious experience as is the end game chat. It's even better when played with friends. I love it.

Naturally, due to the extremely toxic player base, comments are disabled.
